item.name: Settlers Ridge Organic Wines
item.description: Wayne and Kaye Nobbs have established what they say is the only vineyard in WA with organic certification and the only producer in Australia with dual classification from NASAA (National Association for Sustainable Agriculture Australia) and OVAA (Organic Vignerons Association of Australia Inc). They have 7.5ha of vineyard, including shiraz, cabernet sauvignon, merlot, sangiovese, malbec, chenin blanc and sauvignon blanc. Exports to Germany.
